navbar.negativeValues: There is one or more negative value.
navbar.continue: Please change the negative values to continue.

upload.lostProgress: If you reset the progress, all data will be lost.
upload.uploadAgain: In the next step you will have to upload the file again.
upload.languageReset: The language is also reset and may need to be re-set afterwards.
upload.continue: Do they really want to continue?
upload.incompatible: The {{value}} file type is not compatible with the tool.
upload.title: Upload-Page
upload.explanation: Please upload the result file of the last period. Only XML-files are accepted. After upload the the file is validated.
upload.acceptedText: Your file is valid. To continue please press 'Production Program'. If you want to look at the result of the last period please press 'Last Result'.
upload.rejectedText: Your file is not valid. Please reset the Tool and upload the correct XML file.

productionProgram.explanation: Please enter the wanted safety stock. The sell wish for the current period was already extracted from the xml file. For the next periods you can enter a sell forecast.

disposition.explanation: In the second to last column you can add additional production quantities. They will be produced ontop the already set safety stock.

manufacturingSequence.explanation: Here you can see and change the order of the production orders by drag and drop. Additionally you can split the orders. To do so you have to click on the 'split' button.

capacityPlanning.explanation: Here you can see the calculated capacity planning. You also have the possibility to add a buffer ontop of the calculated time. Please enter the wanted buffer time in mitutes/period and not in minutes/day in the buffer column.

materialPlanning.currentStock: Stock at the end of the period
materialPlanning.forecastOfConsumptionUntilPeriod: Forecast of the stock in the period
materialPlanning.explanation: Here you can see the material planning for the period. Additionally you have the option to change the order values of the individual items.

download.title: Download-Page
download.explanation: Here you can download the result file. To do so please press the following button.

coreData.explanationAllItems: Here you can see a table with the quantity summary bill of material for all parts, i.e. production and purchased parts.
coreData.explanationProducedParts: Here you can see a table with the quantity summary bill of material for all in-house production parts.
coreData.explanationPurchasedParts: Here you can see a table with the quantity summary bill of materials for all purchased parts.
coreData.explanationP1: Here you can see an overview of the bill of materials for the P1 bike.
coreData.explanationP2: Here you can see an overview of the bill of materials for the P2 bike.
coreData.explanationP3: Here you can see an overview of the bill of materials for the P3 bike.

dynamicData.resultExplanation: Here you can see some KPIs of the result from the last period.
dynamicData.futureInwardStockMovementExplanation: Here you can see the the future inward stock movement.
dynamicData.warehousestockExplanation: Here you can see the warehouse stock at the end of the period. If an article if out of stock the corresponding row will be highlighted in red.
